value.name: Police on homeless outreach team shoot man who pulled gun
value.description: Police officers on a city team providing services to homeless people shot and killed a man who pulled a gun on them in inland Southern California, authorities said. The shooting happened Saturday morning in an area of downtown Riverside frequented by homeless residents,
